props.name: actionMode
props.desc:
which property holds the element that used for  hide() / show() / disable() / enable()
default is 'el'

props.name: allowDomMove
props.desc: Whether the component can move the Dom node when rendering (defaults to true).

props.name: disableClass
props.desc: CSS class added to the component when it is disabled (defaults to "x-item-disabled").

props.name: hideMode
props.desc:
How this component should hidden. Supported values are
"visibility" (css visibility), "offsets" (negative offset position) and
"display" (css display) - defaults to "display".

events.name: beforedestroy
events.desc: Fires before the component is destroyed. Return false to stop the destroy.

events.name: beforehide
events.desc: Fires before the component is hidden. Return false to stop the hide.

events.name: beforerender
events.desc: Fires before the component is rendered. Return false to stop the render.

events.name: beforeshow
events.desc: Fires before the component is shown.  Return false to stop the show.

events.name: destroy
events.desc: Fires after the component is destroyed.

events.name: disable
events.desc: Fires after the component is disabled.

events.name: enable
events.desc: Fires after the component is enabled.

events.name: hide
events.desc: Fires after the component is hidden.

events.name: render
events.desc: Fires after the component is rendered.

events.name: show
events.desc: Fires after the component is shown.
